title: Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro finally receive March Feature Drop and Android 12L
content:
Most Pixel phones received the Android 12L update (also known as Android 12.1) near the start of March, which was combined with the March security patches and a Pixel Feature Drop. However, the Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro had to wait a bit longer, and now it looks like the update is finally reaching

The post Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro finally receive March Feature Drop and Android 12L appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Verizon has started rolling out the March Pixel update to the Pixel 6 and 6 Pro, which also includes Android 12L/Android 12.1.
